items.sentence: I\'m a vegetarian, so I\'d rather not have meat, if that\'s okay.
I started last in the race, but I soon caught up with the others.
Tom says Mary doesn\'t have to stay here if she doesn\'t want to.
It didn\'t surprise me at all that Tom couldn\'t afford a lawyer.
It\'s difficult to teach people what they\'re unwilling to learn.
Tom told me that the medicine he was taking didn\'t seem to help.
Tom couldn\'t think of any reasons why Mary wouldn\'t want to go.
Tom didn\'t know that I couldn\'t do what he was asking me to do.
Tom didn\'t know that he shouldn\'t believe everything Mary said.
Just stick around a few days and you\'ll come to love this place.
